mapper.sql: id, parent_id, code, name, type, description, config, delete_status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, version
mapper.select: SELECT u2.id, u2.parent_id, u2.name, u2.code, u2.type, u2.description, u2.config, u1.level FROM( SELECT @ids AS p_ids, (SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT(id) FROM rbac_permission WHERE FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @ids)) AS c_ids, @l := @l+1 AS level FROM rbac_permission, (SELECT @ids := #{id}, @l := 0) b WHERE @ids IS NOT NULL ) u1 JOIN rbac_permission u2 ON FIND_IN_SET(u2.id, u1.p_ids)
